Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17257575]HIV-1:inhibition of reverse transcriptase(RNA-dependent DNA polymerase) activity(IC50=4 μM);inhibition of reverse transcriptase(DNA-dependent DNA polymerase) activity(IC50=6.8 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide could bind the reverse transcriptase and inhibits its DNA-polymerase activity and thus inhibits virus replication.

Literature.Title: Inhibition of human immunodeficiency virus type-1 reverse transcriptase by a novel peptide derived from the viral integrase.
Literature.Author: Oz Gleenberg I, Herschhorn A, Goldgur Y, Hizi A.
